data.name: xDD
data.description: The full set of documents within the xDD corpus. See https://xdd.wisc.edu/api/dictionaries?dictionary=covid-19&show_terms=true for the full list of target terms.

data.name: xdd-covid-19
data.description: The set of PDF documents within the primary xDD corpus containing terms in the xDD covid-19 vocabulary. See https://xdd.wisc.edu/api/dictionaries?dictionary=covid-19&show_terms=true for the full list of target terms.

data.name: cord-19
data.description: The set of PDF documents within the primary xDD corpus also present in the CORD-19 dataset, defined by Semantic Scholar/the Allen Institute of AI. See https://www.semanticscholar.org/cord19 for further details.
